you may end up with a dynamic client. Implementations now are static, compi=

 all of the links wired in the code.

2. False. SOAP nor Web Services do no=
t hide in any way the resourced ID. Actually, a web service is a resource w=
ith an ID.

We may be careful not to confuse the business semantics with th=
e transport and envelop semantics.
